knimeNode.name: UNIX Timestamp to Date&Time
knimeNode.shortDescription: Parses date and/or time strings into Date&Time cells.

fullDescription.intro:
Parses the integer or long values in the selected columns and converts them into Date&Time cells. The inputs should be unix timestamps either in seconds, milli-, micro- or nanoseconds since the epoch (1.1.1970).
For the output you may choose between local and zoned date and time formats and if necessary add the timezone.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be parsed.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the converted columns.

tab.name: Input Format
tab.option: The unit of the input unix timestamp. May be either milli-, micro- or nanoseconds.

tab.name: Output Format
tab.option: The type of the new data cells can be selected.
A timezone with an optional offset, e.g. 'UTC', 'GMT+2' or 'CET-1'. Is only used if 'Zoned Date&Time' is selected as the New Type.

ports.outPort: Output table containing the parsed columns.
